sentences.en: A follower of Thomas Jefferson or a proponent of his politics.
sentences.cn: 杰斐逊的塑像和真人一样大小.

sentences.en: Craig Larman is a strong proponent of using the RUP in a lightweight manner.
sentences.cn: CraigLarman是轻量级方式开发过程中使用RUP的强烈建议者.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE: Our new boss a proponent of short but frequent staff meetings.
sentences.cn: 我们的新老板主张,员工会议应该简短,但要经常开.

sentences.en: Except as otherwise by statute the proponent of a rule or the burden of proof.
sentences.cn: 除法律另有规定者外,规章或裁决令的提议方负有举证责任.

sentences.en: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.cn: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的主要拥护者。

sentences.en: Stapp became a strong early proponent of automobile seat belts.
sentences.cn: 斯塔普是力主在汽车上采用座椅安全带的早期创导者.

words.tran_cn: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者

trans.tran_cn: 支持者，拥护者，提倡者，提出认证遗嘱者
trans.tran_en: someone who supports something or persuades people to do something
